resumeData.name: Facundo Rossi
resumeData.occupation: I'm a software engineer based in Córdoba, Argentina. I'm really enjoying the challenges my profession involves. I take it as a great opportunity to continuing growing as a person as well as professional.

aboutMe.text: Hi, this is Facundo. I'm a Software Engineer. I keen on each aspect of building apps from design, develop, test and deliver software in order to accomplish user needs.

I have worked on projects oriented towards the web environment and my skills are broad: as a backend developer, I’ve worked with Java, Spring Framework, EJB, JUnit and as a frontend, I have experience with Html, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, and ReactJS.
Besides, I've got involved in DevOps and Continuous Integration tasks working with Jenkins, Docker, AWS, SonarQube for Manage product build lifecycle

Education.title: National Technological University
Education.subtitle: Information System Engineering • December 2017
Education.description: Completed and graduated with the Information Systems Engineer degree at the National Technological University of Córdoba, Argentina
